title: Rear upper part corner near sideSOLD

posts.content:
This is basically the upper part of the rear side and corner down to the swage round to tail gate opening.
No roof on this, useful if you have a use........
Â£50SOLD

Ron

You know me Graham..."...large..

Had a good clear out today and found some curtain tie backs, now they look shop bought but old enough to be for a camper, quite a few years ago a friend of mine cleared his garage out, ie the table you have, he said then that they came from a bus and I was wondering if from the same bus..!!
They have small painted rings with a hole in the center and a platted cord through, which you put the curtain through bit like what you might have in a front room on the wall, like a tie back....
Any ideas...

Mine with the table would have looked like this




Curtains with pockets top and bottom hung on wires with big loop on ends attached each end to large rivets..

Sent PM...

Send me pictures of the tie back and the rear corner
I will post up...the corner picture..
